Posts.Content: I have four children ages 23 ,13,11 and 7 , i told my eldest seperate from younger ones , filled my pockets with tissues and took the middle 2 for a walk and after telling them felt so relieved and was so proud on how well they took the news my youngest was also fantastic , be truthful , i showed mine my lumps and explained what was going to happen and anything the want to know i would tell them , I was very open and if i felt crap i told them and they helped keep me going xxx lids are so good and dont get the credit they deserve
